channel.title: [DELTA]How to make an NPC Walk around?[DELTA]
channel.description:
Alright, so I want to make my Godwars NPCs walk around by themselves randomly. I know I need to edit in autospawn.cfg, and it is in the part.
[code]spawn = 1115 2911 3612 0 0 0 0 0 1[/code]
All I need to know is which 0 means what? I know what some mean;
[code] spawn = NPCID XCOORD YCOORD HEIGHT 0 0 0 0 DIRECTIONNPCFACES[/code]
The rest of the 0s are the coords where the npc walks, but I don't know which coords to put where? help please?
EXTRA INFO:
I did search around, but I could not find anything special. Here is where I searched; http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=search2

item.title: [DELTA]How to make an NPC Walk around?[DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @Berky-Scape Berky-Scape
item.description:
@Berky-Scape wrote:

spawn = 2263 3017 4824 0 3021 4828 2975 4820 1
spawn = npcid xpos ypos H Pos+1 Pos+1 Pos-1 Pos-1 walktype, idk what it does keep it on 0 or 1.

H= Height
Pos= Coord
Ok, the npcid = 2263
3017 = the x coord
4824 = y coord
0 = height of the npc
3021 = when you do ::mypos , you will get 2 coords. One Xcoord and one Ycoord.
If you want the npc to walk 1 step from the original coord make the 3017 = original coord + 1.
So it will be 3017+1=3018
Thats the same with the last two coord but then you do 3017-1 instead of +.

Read full topic

Alright, so I want to make my Godwars NPCs walk around by themselves randomly. I know I need to edit in autospawn.cfg, and it is in the part.

spawn = 1115	2911	3612	0	0	0	0	0	1

All I need to know is which 0 means what?
I know what some mean;

 spawn = NPCID	XCOORD	YCOORD	HEIGHT	0	0	0	0	DIRECTIONNPCFACES

The rest of the 0s are the coords where the npc walks, but I don’t know which coords to put where? help please?
